text: This man agreed that his engagement had been broken off after one particular tiff, but denied that he owed Miss Camp any money. All the while the police were casting described this individual as a man of about thirty, of medium height, with a dark moustache, and wearing a frockcoat and a top-hat.
handwritten_text: This man agreed that his engagement had been broken off after one particular tiff, but denied that he owed Miss Camp any money. All the while the police were casting described this individual as a man of about thirty, of medium height, with a dark moustache, and wearing a frockcoat and a top-hat.
